questions.question: The greater the surface area of the packing of the fractionating column,

answers.b: Efficiency doesn't depends on the surface area of the column
answers.c: The faster the distillation will proceed

explanations.a: Incorrect – Larger surface area typically improves efficiency.
explanations.b: Incorrect – Surface area does affect efficiency.
explanations.c: Incorrect – Speed isn't necessarily improved by surface area.
explanations.d: Correct – Greater surface area provides more surface for condensation and evaporation cycles, improving separation.

questions.question: When the vapour pressure of a liquid equals atmospheric pressure, the temperature of the liquid equals:

explanations.a: Correct – By definition, this is the boiling point.
explanations.b: Incorrect – Vaporisation point is a broader term.
explanations.c: Incorrect – Normal boiling point refers to 1 atm pressure.
explanations.d: Incorrect – Only true for water at 1 atm.
